part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fluid pumps lie in wait, waiting for the thermometers to sound the alarms on this emergency coolant device.

part.Name: TemperatureAdjuster
part.BehaviorDescription: Rapidly cools the wearer when their temperature exceeds 212 degrees.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A yellow-handled power tool used for cutting through tough metals. Its small, circular blade spins when the trigger is squeezed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A gross body part filled with chilly, glowing fluid.

part.Name: TemperatureAdjuster
part.BehaviorDescription: Heats up the area when worn or placed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crimson shield cut from the carapace of a live magma crab, radiating heat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ornately carved wood conceals a felt interior. An inscription speaks to the Loaf, and the honor of solitude.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ornately carved wood conceals a felt interior. An inscription speaks to the Goodest Boy, and the honor of pets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A primitive club hewn from fragile witchwood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Scissor-like hinges fold metal rods into a tight sphere that's ready for isokinetic expansion on impact.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A massive shield fashioned from a hunk of a great saltback's carapace.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the insulated cask of the battery, the electromotive apparatus cracks the energy out of plant sap and converts it to electrical charge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sporty arm wraps used by masters of unarmed combat, enabling the use of the elbows as fierce weapons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A drab green hat with a low-hanging brim for shading the eyes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small bottle composed of thin plastifer, complete with removabale lid. Not terribly sturdy, but very portable.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A gentle warmth emenates from this heavy power core.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chemically reactive material contained in a housing which produces light. Hopefully nothing leaks out.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soft, comfy slippers fashioned from spider silk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clasps lock around the arm of the wearer, situating the device where it will deliver more blood to thirsty muscles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The eaters somehow weren't enough for themselves, and have repainted their image with fictionalized holograms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crude metal implement held in hand to deliver blows.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A brightly colored cap worn by hunters and athletes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Those who dwell deep in the jungles have learned to grow plants in shapes of their own will, bending nature into packs and clothing. It still drips sap.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A bulky mechanism that converts electricity to heat. Straps on its back allow it to be worn or carried.

part.Name: TemperatureAdjuster
part.BehaviorDescription: Heats up the area around the wearer when in operation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A chalky red pellet carried by dwellers of the deep desert for morbid hydration.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cloak blacker than the night, consuming power to suck in nearby light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A short, iron blade that braces against the wearer's arm.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Data and reticles are painted across the projected screen of this device, providing readouts on target distance and movement speed.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The fibers of love are interwoven with the beautifully shaped head of this arrow, which will surely stop hearts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crude wooden mask worn by tribal savages.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A tiny flamethrower intalled in a steel gauntlet, for use in close quarters combat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This intact hyrkhound jawbone still holds reserves of acids.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Neuron accelerators fire rapidly, pulsating across the cap's inner membrane.

part.Name: Toolbox
part.BehaviorDescription: When worn and powered, this item massively increases the chance of identifying artifacts and recovering additional bits when you disassemble artifacts.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The proboscis of a sap, still filled with the blood of its victims.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A round sawblade once used in a power tool. Its serrated teeth retain their sharpness, despite being covered with a thin layer of rust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The jawbone of a snapjaw, still containing a few sharp teeth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The curved, pointed horn of a majestic beast sought-out by trophy hunters.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: These oversized insectoid mandibles buzz with static electricity.

part.Name: SapChargeOnHit
part.BehaviorDescription: On a successful hit, drains electrical charge from its target and its target's equipment and transfers the charge to the energy cell slotted into itself with poor efficiency.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The great grandmothers and grandfathers of the salt dunes are sometimes shed of their skin by the mightiest warriors of the lands. These skins still live and breathe, hardening themselves with the salts carried by the winds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: As they glide through the salts and sands of a forgotten world, the great grandmothers and grandfathers gather minerals of eons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A clipping of a tough, bloodthirsty vine that happens to grow grapes. Sharp thorns protect the wearer from attacks, and potentially enhance their own.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When worn, generates a small amount of wine which must be manually collected. Once equipped, removing the vine will destroy it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tiny tubes stick out the bottom of this mechanical contraption, designed to sink into the veins. This lifeblood is then turned into another: water.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Generates water at the expense of the wearer's vitality.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The complete jawbone of a madpole still sports its wicked fangs, making it an ideal weapon.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The long, sticky tongue of a pearlfrog fashioned into a whip-like weapon.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A small fragment of bone shaped well enough for cutting and throwing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sharp chunk of rib bone from a troll, suitable for stabbing applications.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A prickly growth from a thirst thistle that has been carefully twisted into headwear. Its fronds slowly absorb water from the air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A softly glowing wreath made from intertwined glowpad fibers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Softly glowing scales from a glowfish.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An ornately painted skull of an elder cyclopean gibbon, one even more massive and powerful than those known today.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blackness emenates from the blade of the umbral sword, consuming light from the world around it. Seas of blood have poured over the weapon to float it down the path to its current master, who will no doubt be a temporary one.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The angular crystal atop this headpiece calls out to the void, reaching into the boundless luminescence with a bright light that cannot be ignored.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An intimidating mask which obscures the wearer's vision.

object.Name: Arch Dervish of the Sightless Way

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The elder sages imbued their power, giving strength to those less gifted. Behold: the danger of their wisdom.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When powered and equipped, increases the level of all mental mutations by 1.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The leg bone of a humanoid creature.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The wretched skull of some forgotten race of giants.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A mechanized arachnid-like tail folded into a small backpack. A large blade is fixed at the end, connected to a small tank for holding poison.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When charged, this weapon's penetration value is equal to the defender's armor value.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dazzling light shines off this gorgeous, glittery cape.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This dense, reflective box contains a slot for recharging energy cells using solar rays.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The softly glowing egg of a glowcrow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A soft, silky egg sac from a cave spider. What could be inside?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Spindle-limbed, pale, and skittish, it skitters around anxiously.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A putrid organ from a poison producing creature. Its hazardous contents slosh around within, ready to burst.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Modeled after the paint cans of old, this benign invention of the eaters applies a preset illustration to a surface.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An ancient, blood stained robe passed down through generations of savage warriors, empowering them through bloodlust.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Requires a constant source of liquid blood, increasing fighting ability and providing a slight stun chance on melee attacks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A portable light powered by an energy cell.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tiny wires dangle from this medical marvel, waiting to be inserted into the skin where they watch upon the wellbeing of the host.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: Improves health while fueled. Once equipped, removing the device will destroy it.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: An icky organ from a slime producing creature, still full of awful goo.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hungry for sweet, sticky syrup which it cannot produce itself, this massive wasp fights only for its host.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text: When fed honey, will poison enemies more often in melee. Will leave if unequipped.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Particles spin within the massive cannon, where they will soon challenge the weaving of spacetime.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pineapple shaped ovoid, sheathed in a bundle of folded-up steel legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Racing across the ground at alarming speed is the unmistakable form of a hand grenade.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pineapple shaped ovoid, sheathed in a swath of folded-up steel legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pineapple shaped ovoid, sheathed in a huge smattering of folded-up steel legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A built in thermoelectric generator powers the coils wrapped around this rifle, launching ionized molten rounds at a massive velocity.
